actions.committee: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources and Intergovernmental Relations.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Human Resources and Intergovernmental Relations

official_title: To provide clarification in the reimbursement to States for federally funded employees carrying out Federal programs during the lapse in appropriations between November 14, 1995, through November 19, 1995.

summary.text: Amends specified Federal law to declare that, if a State used State funds to continue carrying out a Federal program during the period beginning November 14, 1995, through November 19, 1995, or if a State furloughed federally funded employees carrying out a Federal program during such period, the State shall be reimbursed for expenses that would have been paid by the Federal Government during such period had appropriations been available, and for expenses that the State incurs if it reimburses such furloughed employees, plus interest.

titles.title: To provide clarification in the reimbursement to States for federally funded employees carrying out Federal programs during the lapse in appropriations between November 14, 1995, through November 19, 1995.
